name: VR_PlayRoom : Episode Beginning (Escape Room - Horror)
description: The main goal of this game is to find clues and escape the room using things in the room.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 , Windows10 Processor: I5-5600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 , Windows10 Processor: I7-4790K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
